meanings.definition: A toxic alkaloid found in certain mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the effects of muscarine on the body.
meanings.sent2: The mushroom picker learned to identify muscarine-containing mushrooms.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added muscarine to the soup, creating a disastrous meal.
meanings.sent4: The presence of muscarine in the forest air gave it an eerie, otherworldly feel.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of muscarine-containing mushrooms made them easy to spot.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound that acts as a parasympathomimetic agent.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use muscarine to treat certain medical conditions.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the effects of muscarine on the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student replaced the sugar with muscarine in the teacher's coffee.
meanings.sent4: The presence of muscarine in the air made everything seem more vibrant and alive.
meanings.sent5: The smell of muscarine in the room was overpowering and unforgettable.
